name: invary
description: A small library of simple immutable data structures such as Array and Object.

scripts.coveralls: npm run build && node ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --root dist/src jasmine-node dist/spec
scripts.test: npm run build && node ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine-node dist/spec && NODE_ENV=dev node ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine-node dist/spec
